ai-anya-e0903n3:172_4: do they say what you have said without falsely misrepresenting you? Do they explain according to the Teaching so that they can’t be legitimately criticized?”
ai-anya-e0903n3:172_5: In that case, the ascetic Gotama says this: “Chief, what the ascetic Gotama says is rough categorically condemns and denounces those self-mortifiers who live rough.”
ai-anya-e0903n3:173_1: And how can you explain in detail the Blessed One’s teaching?
ai-anya-e0903n3:174_1: There are these three kinds of pleasure seekers in the world.
ai-anya-e0903n3:174_3: Take a pleasure seeker who seeks wealth using illegitimate, coercive means, and who doesn’t make themselves happy and pleased, nor share it and make merit. They may be praised by the Buddha, nor share it and make merit. They may be praised by the Buddha.
ai-anya-e0903n3:175_1: And how can they analyze so that they can describe the detailed explanation in detail?
ai-anya-e0903n3:176_1: There are these three mortifiers found in the world.
ai-anya-e0903n3:176_3: It’s when someone goes forth from the lay life to homelessness out of faith.
